title: Patch Mid-game?
body:
So I was having a incredibly intense close game, for some reason suddenly dc-ed from game, that's fine, no worries, just reconnect, ok, relaunch league and boom! there's a patch. 

Ok then, I'll just patch for 10minutes MIDGAME during did I mention, an intense close game, yeap no problem at all. Didn't even get Loss Prevented woohooo,  best game ever!

replies.body:
Really?

Do you have any programs on your system that routinely deletes data or something? I don't recall a patch being released recently. Your client would only do that mid game if something were affected during game-play.
